name: Deadly Truckers
description:
A simple yet fun game to fool around made in about 3/4 hours as practice for the Global Game Jam 2019.

You are being chased by violent explosives-filled truckers who want to kill you. They have a limited amount of time to get you before they explode. You have to escape. The longer you can avoid them, the longer you will survive.

Have fun!

Controls:

  • A/Left Arrow - Steer to the LEFT
  • D/Right Arrow - Steer to the RIGHT
